events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product is not what I expected.
The support system has categorized the issue as a refund request based on keywords related to returning the wrong item and money back.
Your case has been assigned to our customer support agent Jane Smith who will assist you with your refund request.
Hello! I'm Jane from customer support. I understand you received an incorrect item and want a refund. I'll be happy to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a picture of the item, which clearly shows it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund promptly and email you the confirmation shortly. You should receive the refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear explanation. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been processed successfully on our end. Please check your bank account in the next few days to confirm receipt of the funds.
We wanted to follow up to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is now satisfactory with your order experience.
Since you have confirmed receipt of your refund and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
